topics.body:
What's the deal with bullet hells and shmups having crazy amounts of outside lore? 
Touhou apparently has several mountains worth, ikaruga has a decent pile if I'm not mistaken and sine mora's, while present within the game, requires a flow chart to even understand.
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fcdd5d636872373ea90100#post_53fcdd5d636872373ea90100
The reason for Touhou having crazy amounts of outside lore is that it takes place in a mythological universe.

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fce50c63687275fe9c0100#post_53fce50c63687275fe9c0100
Cause it's crazy popular.  No seriously here's a picture from a convention that is solely about Touhou:
!http://i300.photobucket.com/albums/nn6/jyenicolson/Japan1291.jpg!
Imagine how popular something like Pokemon is; that's how popular Touhou is in Japan and it's coming to the USA soon with a downloadable english version.  The reason why it's not as popular as Pokemon in the USA is solely due to the language barrier and soon that barrier will be gone.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
If is so goddamn popular, then why there is not an official anime of Touhou?

:/
topics.author: 5239db6da4c72d22d9000358

topics.body:
"@Shadow_the_Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53fce76f6368724d11910100#post_53fce76f6368724d11910100
[bq="Shadow_the_Hedgehog"]If is so goddamn popular, then why there is not an official anime of Touhou?

:/[/bq]
Because the creator doesn't want there to be one; he has been contacted before about it but he doesn't want a bad studio to shit all over the franchise.  What I mean by this is that have you ever played a really good video game and then a studio creates a anime based off it only for it to be shit?  That's why he keep saying no to the studios.

You know how the resident evil live action movies are shit?  That's what the creator is worried of happening.

There is a fan anime though:
"Fantasy Kaleidoscope: red mist incident":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KqM5hjcf48E
"Red mist incident episode 2":https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KEff2L_ry5k
